alert.note: Alert for Jones; Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 8:31PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Jones and northwestern Lyman Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 931 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vivian, or 16 miles east of Murdo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Vivian around 940 PM CDT. 5 Mile Corner around 950 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Presho, Fate Dam, Kennebec and Byre Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
